Desc.entry: A registered charity that negotiates, constructs and promotes public access to the River Don in East Sheffield and encourages appropriate and responsible recreational uses. Gives guided walks in Environment Weeks and by arrangement. Holds winter lectures from January to March (see local press or Five Weirs Walk Trust website for details). Current objectives include supporting the Sheffield River Stewardship Company which takes responsibility for the management and maintenance of the river and walk.

Pubs.entry: Friends of FWW Bulletin; Annual Report; Guide to Five Weirs Walk
